revised_title: Assessing the Communications and Educational Implications of the Communications Technology Satellite
tldr: This article discusses the proposed educational experiments involving the Communications Technology Satellite (CTS) in northern Ontario. The main objective is to assess the communications and educational implications of the CTS in this region, which has limited existing communication facilities. The experiments aim to determine the viability of satellite communications, demonstrate the impact of specific educational and social uses, and facilitate the education, social well-being, and cultural maintenance of native peoples in the area.
